description:
The Gentoo Linux distribution is in the process of shuttering its Gentoo Foundation now that it's become a Software in the Public Interest project, which gives it tax exempt status and much, much more.

The post Gentoo Linux Becomes a Software in the Public Interest Project Because…Bookkeeping and Taxes appeared first on FOSS Force.
title: Gentoo Linux Becomes a Software in the Public Interest Project Because…Bookkeeping and Taxes
